code: import React from"react";import{useSummary}from"../contexts";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Summary=()=>{const{summary}=useSummary();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:summary&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"w-full bg-[#E0E7FF]",id:"summary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"w-[55vw] items-center mx-auto min-h-screen p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{class:"text-[32px] font-semibold pt-20 my-2",children:"Summary:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:summary.url,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{class:"text-[20px] font-semibold hover:underline",children:["Video: ",summary.title]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-4 rounded-2xl",children:summary.type==="point-form"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{class:"list-disc ml-5",children:summary.text.map(point=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:point}))}):summary.text})]})})});};export default Summary;
